attributes.action: University accommodation rent to be lowered or cancelled for the final term
attributes.additional_details: I understand many of us students have signed contracts to stay in University accomodation, but there is a difference between being legal and ethical. International students were called back to their country. Students have lost their jobs, can’t get a flight back to the Uk, stay with a guardian or live at home. We shouldn’t have to pay the full amount of rent to say the least.
attributes.background: University students shouldn’t have to pay the full amount of rent for the final term of their accomodation. Many students have to pay between £4000-£9000 of rent
